name: Lazy Ants
tagline: Symfony, Laravel, NodeJS, Angular, ReactJS, Ionic
description:
Lazy Ants offers software development services to tech startups and companies specializing in robust web services, complex e-commerce solutions and mobile apps. We are built on a foundation of cutting-edge technologies, Agile best practice and BDD techniques.
We are software development company with over 9 years’ experience from Ukraine. 
Our goal is to produce high-quality solutions in estimated terms. 
And we are very responsible with it. There are four main directions we are focusing on:
Web
We are a team of passionate Symfony, Laravel and NodeJS developers and we use Angular and React to build our front-ends.
Mobile
We also build amazing mobile applications with Ionic and React Native.
Chatbots
We create bots for Messenger, Slack, Telegram, Viber, or any web-based or other messenger systems with open APIs.
Opensource
And, of course, we love to share useful solutions with everyone.
